::Killfest::

Killfest nods, agreeing with Darkfate about KitKat acting weird (I think I forgot to post that untill now) when he recieves Megaton's transmission. He frowns, repying. "Who's the enemy there?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton spits the armor plates aside taking a claw to pluck the last one
> between his teeth, "I can't help it, it must be the Predacon in me."
> 
> Just then shots came from a different direction (Blots) :"What's this?" the
> Dragon blurted. He knew by now the shields were up and the shots wouldn't
> hurt anything but if there were other attackers it was up to him to prove
> his faith by defending the Maximals in any way he could.   His distraction
> nearly cost him as Zoes shots struck him.(What type of weapon is Zoe
> useing?) The scales on his face protected him but the shots reminded him of
> what the cost of distraction was.
> 
> He lifted his mighty foot and stomped on the ground sending a shockwave in
> the direction of  Zoe and Slayer. His whole body was a physical weapon and
> he knew how to use it well.
> 
> He'd lied about being a leader but knew that the faction at the Black
> Fortress was behind his decision for the sideing between the two teams
> "MegaTON to Black Fortress, I need any available Predacons to assist me at
> the Cybertronian Fire." he shouted. In his mind he could handle this alone,
> he was after all the "invincible" fighting machine. He just figured that a
> show of force from the Predacon side would be more convincing.
